title: Carry Trade Revival That Electrified EM Spurs Optimism for 2026
description: Big investors say that carry trades across emerging markets have further to run in 2026 following a blockbuster year for the popular strategy.
content: Big investors say that carry trades across emerging markets have further to run in 2026 following a blockbuster year for the popular strategy.
